code.resendToast: We just sent you a new code.
code.limit:
You’ve reached our limit of verification codes.
Please try again tomorrow.

tip.title: Didn’t get a code?
tip.first: The email may take up to 5 minutes to arrive.
tip.second: Check your spam or junk folder if you can't find our email.

search.noResults:
No results found for {검색어}.
Make sure that all words are spelled correctly.

resetPassword.title: Reset password
resetPassword.detail: Enter the email you signed up for.
resetPassword.newPassword: Enter a password that you haven’t used before.
resetPassword.warning: Your new password cannot be the same as your old password.

verifyPhone.title: Phone verification
verifyPhone.skipDetail: Do you want to verify later and move on to the sign up page?
verifyPhone.numberInUse: This number is associated with another account. Try logging in.
verifyPhone.unavailable: Phone verification is not available in your region. Let’s move on to the setup page.

loginInfo.email: Choose an email address to use as your account ID.

signup.title:
Almost done!
Please enter your details
signup.ageLimit: To sign up, you need to be at least 18.
signup.underAge: You need to be at least 18.

agreePolicy.title: Terms and conditions
agreePolicy.marketing2: You can opt out at any time in your account settings.
agreePolicy.detail: By clicking 'Agree and sign up', I agree to PeopleHere’s Terms of service and Privacy policy.

allowNotification.title: Turn on notification?
allowNotification.detail:
Don’t miss messages from people here
and posts about cool places.

explore.noPosts: No posts found for your search.

savedPosts.title: Saved Posts
savedPosts.noList:
Explore posts about cool places!
The posts you like will appear here.

post.reportTitle: Why would you like to report?
post.reportDescription: Don’t worry, we won’t tell them. We will review what you share with us here and take action.

photos.title: Add related photos
photos.detail: No photos you’ve taken? Use Google Photos.
photos.noGoogleP2: No Google Photos are available for this location. Please add your own from your gallery.
photos.policy: Photos violating copyright or our policies will be removed.
photos.switchingP1: You've already added photos from your gallery.
photos.switchingP2: Switching to Google Photos will discard your current selection. Continue?

posting.title: Punchy title
posting.description: Things you want to do with people you will meet

preview.title: Preview
preview.uploading: It may take up to a minute...

place.title: Add Place
place.confirm: Is this the correct address and location for your place?
place.warningToast: You need to add a place first.

blank.photos: Please add at least one photo.
blank.title: Please enter the title.

exit.p2: Leaving this page will discard your post.

editPost.unsaved:
You have unsaved changes.
Are you sure you want to leave this page?

inbox.title: Inbox
inbox.noListDetail:
Start a conversation with someone
you’d like to meet.

mypage.title: My Page
mypage.noLogin: Log in to meet new people here
mypage.noPosts: Post about places you’d like to visit with people here.

profile.reportTitle: Why would you like to report?
profile.reportDescription: Don’t worry, we won’t tell them. We will review what you share with us here and take action.
profile.reportCompletedToast: Your user report has been received.
profile.blockP2: You won’t see each other anymore. Once you block, you won’t be able to undo this. Are you sure you want to continue?
profile.blockHeader:
The user has been blocked!
Would you like to tell us the reason for blocking?
profile.blockDescription: Don’t worry, we won’t tell them.

editProfile.guide: Set up your profile to let people here know more about you.
editProfile.showDecade: Show birth decade on your profile?
editProfile.work: What do you do for work?
editProfile.work2: Nurse, retired surfer, parent to twins
editProfile.school: Where did you go to school?
editProfile.school2: Name the school that made you who you are
editProfile.hobby: What do you spend your free time doing?
editProfile.favorite2: Dancing in the shower, hot chocolate
editProfile.pets: Do you have any pets in your life?

managePost.onDetail: Display the ‘Talk to Me’ tag on the post to receive new messages.
managePost.offDetail: Display the ‘On Break’ tag on the post to stop receiving new messages. You can continue messaging with users you’ve already started conversations with.
managePost.status: The post status has been updated.

deletePost.feedback: Tell us why you’re deleting this post

settings.title: Settings
settings.phrase: With every friendship around the world

personal.title: Personal information
personal.needVerify: Verify your identity to build trust in the PeopleHere community.
personal.emailDetail: Enter your new email address, and we will send you a verification email.
personal.phoneConfirmed: Your phone number has been updated.

translation.title: Translation
translation.autoDetail: Automatically translate the content of posts, profiles and messages to English. Turn this feature off if you’d like to show the original language.

notification.title: Notification
notification.messages2: Get notified of new messages from other users.
notification.marketing2: Stay up to date on the latest news from PeopleHere.

contactUs.title: Contact us
contactUs.detail:
If you have any questions or feedback,
please email us at

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.detail: Please tell us why you are leaving PeopleHere. We will make it a better service to welcome you back in the future.
deleteAccount.option3: The app is difficult to use.
deleteAccount.otherDetail: Please let us know why you are deleting your account
deleteAccount.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
deleteAccount.confirmDetail: Your account will be deactivated and then permanently deleted after 30 days. Logging in within this period will reactivate your account.
